attributes.action: Allow public opinion to review decisions made by the criminal justice system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citing the case of Munir Hussain amongst others, most public opinion would seem to concur that this man acted in a proportionate manner and was right to take his action against the intruders. There could therefore be doubt about the actions of the criminal justice system in this and other cases. This petition therefore requests a mechanism to allow the British public to use logic and reason to apply a general conscensus when the justice system is in question.
